title: Mongolia Kempinski Ulaanbaatar City Oasis with Onsite Spa & Three Restaurants
description: Experience old-world glamour and modern comforts with a relaxing stay at Kempinski Hotel Khan Palace Ulaanbaatar. Located in close proximity to the bustling metropolis of Ulaanbaatar city, with 99 luxury rooms and suites, this serene hotel invites you to embrace unparalleled elegance and renowned service. Here, you'll find a collection of unique and modern accommodations, each well-appointed with contemporary facilities, stylish d√©cor and historic allure. A host of luxurious amenities also await, including the tranquil in-house Aster Spa, fitness centre and three delicious restaurants, from traditional Mongolian at the KK Tapas & Grill and European-inspired fare at Tenger Restaurant, to Japanese classics at Sakura Sushi Bar.
